name: perf-audit
description: Multi-perspective performance bottleneck analysis team for finding optimization opportunities

teammates.description: Analyzes N+1 queries, unindexed lookups, missing pagination, ORM anti-patterns
Analyzes unnecessary re-renders, missing memoization, expensive computations in render
Analyzes memory leaks, event listener cleanup, growing collections, closure captures
Analyzes large imports, missing tree-shaking, absent dynamic imports, duplicate deps
Analyzes sync I/O, CPU-intensive loops, blocking operations, algorithmic inefficiency
Analyzes HTTP waterfall, missing batching, no compression, large payloads
Analyzes missing memoization, redundant computations, no HTTP cache headers
Analyzes unoptimized images, render-blocking resources, missing lazy loading
